tool_description: Free crypto news from financial institutions.
name: Free crypto news
title: Free crypto news

api_list.name: get news from specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/etimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
